subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Japan’s Kosuke Kitajima sliced 0.22 seconds off the world mark set by Brendan Hansen of the United States to win the gold medal in the 100-meter breaststroke.
snippet: Japan’s Kosuke Kitajima sliced 0.22 seconds off the world mark set by Brendan Hansen of the United States to win the gold medal in the 100-meter breaststroke.
